TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from nuclear attacks.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防空洞[COLOR_REVERT]减少核打击造成的破坏。应在重要的城市建造。

TEXT.English: Hotel
TEXT.Chinese: 酒店

TEXT.English: Saltovo
TEXT.Chinese: 可萨烟熏室

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammam[COLOR_REVERT], the Turkish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's happiness.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]土耳其浴室[COLOR_REVERT]是奥斯曼的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市的快乐度和健康度。在城市规模需要扩大或是市民的提出要求时建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]土耳其浴室[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Vishwanath
TEXT.Chinese: 印度教黄金殿

TEXT.English: Gompa
TEXT.Chinese: 禅修堂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parks[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's health and happiness.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]公园[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的健康和幸福。

TEXT.English: Islamic Madrassa
TEXT.Chinese: 伊斯兰修道院

TEXT.English: Fiber Network
TEXT.Chinese: 光纤网络

TEXT.English: Veche
TEXT.Chinese: 基辅罗斯法院

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baths[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output and add health to a city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]浴室[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的文化产出，为城市增加健康。

TEXT.English: Zoroastrian Fire Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 祆祠

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Divan[COLOR_REVERT], the Turkic replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], lowers the city's maintenance costs and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]迪凡[COLOR_REVERT]，土库曼民族取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]，降低了城市的维护成本，并允许你雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT] much faster and grant [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] experience points, but also add unhealthiness to the city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]在你卷入海战时将非常有用。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]能更快地建造舰船，并提供额外经验点，但[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shinto Shrine[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shinto[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神道神社[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神道神社[COLOR_REVERT]之后的文明的异教徒神殿[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Piaohao
TEXT.Chinese: 满清票号

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Edubba[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libary[COLOR_REVERT], is half the production cost and increases science output.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃杜巴[COLOR_REVERT]，巴比伦人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libary[COLOR_REVERT]，是生产成本的一半，增加了科学产出。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新教寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]）增加城市的幸福感和文化。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教堂[COLOR_REVERT]需要建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT] and allow you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商业收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]毛皮[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丝绸[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鲸鱼[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市快乐度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Research Institute[COLOR_REVERT], the Russian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT], provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and allows you to hire one extra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]研究所[COLOR_REVERT]是俄国的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]，使所在城市可免费额外供养科学家，并提升科学研究和太空飞船建造速度。

TEXT.English: Yoruba Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 约鲁巴神庙

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] increase that city's income from trade routes and increase that city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharf[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]码头[COLOR_REVERT]增加该城市的贸易路线收入，并增加该城市的健康，因为可以访问[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蚌[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蟹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼[COLOR_REVERT]资源。建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]特拉法加广场[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观需要一个[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]码头[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Dam
TEXT.Chinese: 也门大坝

TEXT.English: Riksbank
TEXT.Chinese: 瑞典皇家银行

TEXT.English: Warehouse
TEXT.Chinese: 仓库

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Anastasis[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 阿纳斯塔西斯[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]东正教神殿[COLOR_REVERT]）为世界上每一个实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]正统[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每转产生一个金币，上限为20金币。它还传播了正统的[COLOR_REVERT]思想，并增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research with access to power and its spaceship production and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supercomputers[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Large Hadron Collider[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力及太空飞船建造能力，但也会影响健康度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Astar Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of Ethiopia.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿斯塔神庙[COLOR_REVERT]是埃塞俄比亚的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Immigration Office
TEXT.Chinese: 澳大利亚移民局

TEXT.English: San Kong
TEXT.Chinese: 孔庙

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力，且不会造成污染。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Distilleries[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's unhealthiness and increase the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]酒厂[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的不健康，并提高COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]大米[COLOR_REVERT]、COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]、COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]糖[COLOR_REVERT]和COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]葡萄酒[COLOR_REVERT]的瓷砖产量。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Charreada Arena[COLOR_REVERT], the Mexican replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arena[COLOR_REVERT], grants experience points to mounted units built in its city and increases happiness from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Charreada竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，墨西哥替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，为在其城市中建造的骑兵单位提供经验点，并增加进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马匹[COLOR_REVERT]的快乐度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gompa[COLOR_REVERT], the Tibetan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], provides less research, increases a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, doesn't require a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], and requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Academia[COLOR_REVERT] technology.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贡帕[COLOR_REVERT]，藏语替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]，提供较少的研究，增加一个城市对预火药单位的防御，允许你雇用一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，提供免费的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，不需要[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]库[COLOR_REVERT]，并且需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]纸张[COLOR_REVERT]技术，而不是[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]学术界[COLOR_REVERT]技术。

TEXT.English: Art Studio
TEXT.Chinese: 艺术作坊

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guozijian[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]书院[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Center[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]行政中心[COLOR_REVERT]降低了附近城市的维护成本。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Citadel[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT], is half the production cost and lowers city maintenance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城防要塞[COLOR_REVERT]是西班牙的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市防御冷兵器时代单位的能力，并使所在城市新组建的压制武器获得额外经验值。

TEXT.English: Mazdaist Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 玛兹达神庙

TEXT.English: Hubal Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 胡巴尔庙

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Yeshivas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jewish Rabbis[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Star Forts[COLOR_REVERT] reduces damage from bombards from all units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]星际堡垒[COLOR_REVERT]减少所有单位的轰炸伤害。

TEXT.English: Solar Plant
TEXT.Chinese: 太阳能发电厂

TEXT.English: Totem Pole
TEXT.Chinese: 图腾柱

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Reservoir[COLOR_REVERT], the Teotihuacano replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT], provides additional health and doesn't require an [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 特马兹卡尔是蒂奥蒂华文明的特殊建筑，用于替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]浴室[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]浴池[COLOR_REVERT]。它提供了额外的健康，并且不需要[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Teotl Step Pyramid[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Teotl[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Teotl Step Pyramid[COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Teotl[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baalist Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Baalism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巴利斯特神庙[COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]巴利斯特[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Jewish Yeshiva
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太修道院

TEXT.English: Buddhist Chaitya
TEXT.Chinese: 佛寺

TEXT.English: Deffufas
TEXT.Chinese: 努比亚纪念碑

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], the Mandinka replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small increase in wealth.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]铸币厂[COLOR_REVERT]，曼丁卡替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]锻造厂[COLOR_REVERT]，提供了一个小的财富增长。

TEXT.English: Taoist Gong
TEXT.Chinese: 道宫

TEXT.English: Druidic Nemeton
TEXT.Chinese: 德鲁伊的尼梅顿

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊斯兰清真寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊斯兰大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabularies[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage. They also increase the happiness output from using the espionage slider.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]警察局[COLOR_REVERT]降低城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]厌战[COLOR_REVERT]并增加间谍活动。他们还增加了使用间谍滑块的幸福输出。

TEXT.English: Glassmaker
TEXT.Chinese: 玻璃作坊

TEXT.English: Shrine of Perun
TEXT.Chinese: 佩伦神殿

TEXT.English: Teotl Step Pyramid
TEXT.Chinese: 梯阶金字塔

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taixue[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] and one more [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]太学[COLOR_REVERT]是中国的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]，提供额外的文化，所在城市可将一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]市民[COLOR_REVERT]转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]，可将三个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]市民[COLOR_REVERT]转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forum[COLOR_REVERT], the Roman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate and allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]中心广场[COLOR_REVERT]是罗马的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场[COLOR_REVERT]，可增加城市财富积累以及 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的产生几率。在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]毛皮[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丝绸[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鲸鱼[COLOR_REVERT]的条件下还能额外提供快乐点数。

TEXT.English: Stadium
TEXT.Chinese: 体育场

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Miaos[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Miaos[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Xue Gong[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hotels[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase trade route yield and increase trade route yield even more for each level of culture.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]酒店[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的文化输出。它们还增加了贸易路线的产量，并增加了贸易路线的产量，每一个层次的文化。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]东正教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）极大地增加了城市的文化产出。如果你的国家宗教是正统的[COLOR_REVERT]，或者你有权使用[COLOR_REVERT]香[COLOR_REVERT]，这会增加城市的幸福感。

TEXT.English: Jewish Sanhedrin
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太教会堂

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Souq[COLOR_REVERT], the Mamluk replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases the culture output of the city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]露天市场[COLOR_REVERT]是马穆鲁克对[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场的替代品，增加了城市的文化产出。

TEXT.English: Bath
TEXT.Chinese: 浴室

TEXT.English: Saint Peter's Basilica
TEXT.Chinese: 圣彼得大教堂

TEXT.English: Adur Farnbag
TEXT.Chinese: 法恩贝格圣火坛

TEXT.English: Edict
TEXT.Chinese: 印度纪念碑

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate and increase the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]粮仓[COLOR_REVERT]储存食物，加速城市成长。在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]资源的情况下可提升城市健康度。

TEXT.English: Zoroastrian Pir
TEXT.Chinese: 祆教会堂

TEXT.English: Alchemist
TEXT.Chinese: 炼金作坊

TEXT.English: Olympian Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 奥林匹亚神庙

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Totem Pole[COLOR_REVERT], the Native American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], grants archery units three bonus experience.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图腾柱[COLOR_REVERT]是美洲土著的特色建筑，取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]原始神庙[COLOR_REVERT]，为城市新组建投射单位+3经验。

TEXT.English: Buddhist Stupa
TEXT.Chinese: 佛堂

TEXT.English: Department Store
TEXT.Chinese: 百货商场

TEXT.English: Edubba
TEXT.Chinese: 泥版书屋

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] increase your cities' defense against pre-gunpowder units, generate a small amount of culture and also grant experience to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Units[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Krak des Chevalier[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力，并能积累少量文化值。可在边境城市建造。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Olympian Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Olympianism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 奥林匹亚圣殿是遵循奥林匹亚主义的文明的异教徒圣殿。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] improve the food output of water plots. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市来自商路的收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛤蜊[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]资源还可提升城市健康度。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bunkers[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from air attacks.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]地堡[COLOR_REVERT]减少空中单位造成的破坏。可在敌方拥有强大空军时（或之前！）建造。

TEXT.English: Reservoir
TEXT.Chinese: 蓄水池

TEXT.English: Royal Mounted Police
TEXT.Chinese: 皇家骑警署

TEXT.English: Cinema
TEXT.Chinese: 电影院

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]正统寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]）增加城市的幸福感和文化。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教堂[COLOR_REVERT]需要建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]东正教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dinh[COLOR_REVERT], the Vietnamese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Square[COLOR_REVERT], gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Garrison I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dinh[COLOR_REVERT]，越南替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市民广场[COLOR_REVERT]的UB，为本市所有符合条件的军事单位提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]城市守卫I[COLOR_REVERT]升级。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天主教寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]）增加城市的幸福感和文化。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教堂[COLOR_REVERT]需要建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天主教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: Protestant Cathedral
TEXT.Chinese: 新教大教堂

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mall[COLOR_REVERT], the American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Department Store[COLOR_REVERT], greatly increases the wealth output of the city when it has access to power and increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Events[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]购物中心[COLOR_REVERT]是美国的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]百货商店[COLOR_REVERT]，在城市通电的情况下，可大幅增加城市金币产出，并能增加[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门足球赛事[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]卖座电影[COLOR_REVERT]资源为城市带来的快乐度。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力。建造城墙可抵御敌国或蛮族的攻击。

TEXT.English: Weaver
TEXT.Chinese: 织布工坊

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pirs[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zoroastrian Magu[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pirs[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德修道院[COLOR_REVERT]）允许您创建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德教Magu[COLOR_REVERT]，他们可以在其他城市传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德教[COLOR_REVERT]。它们也为研究提供了文化和些许推动。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT], the Mughal replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Heritage[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Horticulture[COLOR_REVERT] technology and provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]，莫卧儿人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]庄园[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]遗产[COLOR_REVERT]技术，而不是[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]园艺[COLOR_REVERT]技术，并提供免费[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supercomputers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research with access to power and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]超级计算机[COLOR_REVERT]增加了一个城市的科学研究，使你有机会获得电力，并允许你雇用一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Asatru Hof[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Asatru[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Asatru Hof[COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Asatru[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeon[COLOR_REVERT], the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's happiness and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]露天剧场[COLOR_REVERT]是希腊的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]，提升城市快乐度，可将一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]市民[COLOR_REVERT]转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Catholic Cathedral
TEXT.Chinese: 天主教大教堂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fiber Networks[COLOR_REVERT] increase commerce output in cities with access to power.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]光纤网络[COLOR_REVERT]增加有电力供应的城市的商业产出。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]皇家火灾[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）极大地增加了城市的文化产出。如果你的国家宗教是琐罗亚斯德教，或者你有权使用熏香，这会增加城市的幸福感。

TEXT.English: Fazenda
TEXT.Chinese: 巴西农场

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ikhanda[COLOR_REVERT], the Zulu replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT], are more expensive and lower city maintenance costs.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]特训兵营[COLOR_REVERT]是祖鲁的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]，可使所在城市新组建的单位获得额外经验值，并减少城市维护费。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ho Trai[COLOR_REVERT], the Thai replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness and is cheaper.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]藏经阁[COLOR_REVERT]，泰语替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]库[COLOR_REVERT]，增加幸福感，而且更便宜。

TEXT.English: Container Terminal
TEXT.Chinese: 集装箱码头

TEXT.English: Mbwadi
TEXT.Chinese: 姆瓦迪

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tambo[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Office[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper and increases trade route yield.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tambo[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]邮局[COLOR_REVERT]的印加替代品，它需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]工程[COLOR_REVERT]技术，而不是[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]纸张[COLOR_REVERT]技术，成本更低，并提高了贸易路线的收益率。

TEXT.English: Paya
TEXT.Chinese: 缅甸佛塔

TEXT.English: Hacienda
TEXT.Chinese: 哥伦比亚庄园

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教黄金殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness, increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] and increases the happiness output from using the culture slider.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]赛马场[COLOR_REVERT]为拜占庭的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]，提供1单位快乐值，如有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马匹[COLOR_REVERT]可再增加1单位快乐，如财政预算中文化支出达到特定比例还可额外增加快乐值。

TEXT.English: Buddhist Sangha
TEXT.Chinese: 佛院

TEXT.English: Automated Factory
TEXT.Chinese: 自动化工厂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Department Stores[COLOR_REVERT] increase wealth in cities with access to power and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]百货商店[COLOR_REVERT]在有权使用电力的城市增加财富，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商人[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's research and provide culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National College[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的科研能力并产生文化值。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Feitoria[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT], improves the commerce output of water plots.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Feitoria[COLOR_REVERT]，葡萄牙人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关[COLOR_REVERT]，提高了水田的商业产出。

TEXT.English: Islamic Grand Mosque
TEXT.Chinese: 伊斯兰清真寺

TEXT.English: Charreada Arena
TEXT.Chinese: 查雷达竞技场

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT], allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and allow the city to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBM[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ITER[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铀[COLOR_REVERT]的情况下，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]可为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mala'e[COLOR_REVERT], the Polynesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides additional culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]玛拉[COLOR_REVERT]，波利尼西亚人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，提供额外的文化，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Paya[COLOR_REVERT], the Burmese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] and one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]缅甸佛塔[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]库[COLOR_REVERT]的缅甸替代品，允许您雇佣一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]神父[COLOR_REVERT]和一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Port[COLOR_REVERT], the Philipine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's wealth output.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]菲律宾港口[COLOR_REVERT]，菲律宾替代了[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]，增加了城市的财富产出。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Orthodox Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]东正教修道院[COLOR_REVERT]）允许您创建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]东正教传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，他们可以在其他城市传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]正统教[COLOR_REVERT]。它们也为研究提供了文化和些许推动。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sacrificial Altar[COLOR_REVERT], the Aztec replacements for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and reduces the anger duration from sacrificing population.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人牲祭坛[COLOR_REVERT]是阿兹特克的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]，建造成本更低，可减少通过牺牲人口加速生产造成不满所持续的时间。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道宫[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: Zoroastrian Royal Fire
TEXT.Chinese: 祆教圣火

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Offices[COLOR_REVERT] provide an extra trade route and increase espionage. They also allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Offices[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]News Presses[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]邮局[COLOR_REVERT]提供额外的贸易路线并增加间谍活动。他们还允许你雇用一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]专家。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]邮局[COLOR_REVERT]需要建立[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新闻出版社[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the commerce generated by a city's foreign trade routes. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Container Terminal[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市海外商路产生的商业。所在城市拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]集装箱码头[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。

TEXT.English: Caravanserai
TEXT.Chinese: 伊朗商站

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Druidic Nemeton[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Druidism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 德鲁伊德鲁伊尼梅顿（COLOR_REVERT）是继德鲁伊德鲁伊主义（COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT）之后的文明的异教徒神庙（COLOR_REVERT）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salon[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coffee House[COLOR_REVERT], provides a cultural bonus, increases the birthrate of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT] and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]沙龙[COLOR_REVERT]是法国的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天文台[COLOR_REVERT]，提升所在城市文化，加快[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟人[COLOR_REVERT]出现速度，可将一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]市民[COLOR_REVERT]转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouses[COLOR_REVERT] provide an extra trade route.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可提升水域的食物产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: Confucian Academy
TEXT.Chinese: 书院

TEXT.English: Arena
TEXT.Chinese: 竞技场

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）极大地增加了城市的文化产出。如果你的国教是新教，或者你有权使用香，那么这会增加城市的幸福感。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Kong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孔庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Hindu Kshetra
TEXT.Chinese: 印度教神殿

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides a major bonus to Culture output in your city and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]是埃及的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，为所在城市带来大量文化产出，可将一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]市民[COLOR_REVERT]转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]神学家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's production of wealth and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Bank[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市商业收入。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: Ziara
TEXT.Chinese: 斯瓦希里纪念碑

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's unhealthiness. They also increase a city's production, increase production output in cities with access to power and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Solar Plants[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Automation Factory[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市生产力，但会显著影响健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]的前提，在拥有相应资源的情况下能提升生产力。

TEXT.English: Obelisk
TEXT.Chinese: 方尖碑

TEXT.English: Ho Trai
TEXT.Chinese: 藏经阁

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dye[COLOR_REVERT] and allow you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]织工[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的文化产出。他们还可以使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绵羊[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]棉花[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]染料[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，增加城市的幸福感，并允许您雇佣两名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]专家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mosques[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mosques[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Grand Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: Cold Storage Plant
TEXT.Chinese: 冷藏库

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apothecary[COLOR_REVERT], the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pharmacy[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Medicine[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alchemy[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's health and increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]药剂店[COLOR_REVERT]是波斯的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]杂货店[COLOR_REVERT]，可增加城市的财富积累和健康点数。在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]食糖[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]酒类[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香蕉[COLOR_REVERT]的条件下还能额外提供健康点数。

TEXT.English: Mausoleum
TEXT.Chinese: 陵墓

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tengri Obo[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tengri[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]腾格里奥博[COLOR_REVERT]是继[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]腾格里[COLOR_REVERT]之后的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Ball Court
TEXT.Chinese: 球场

TEXT.English: Sewer
TEXT.Chinese: 城市排水系统

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Assembly Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], grants experience points to armored units built in its city, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, allows you to hire one more [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and is produced 50% faster with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]装配工厂[COLOR_REVERT]是德国的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]，为所在城市组建的装甲单位提供经验，并在所在城市增加一名免费[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]，可将一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]市民[COLOR_REVERT]转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]煤[COLOR_REVERT]资源可使装配工厂建造速度加快50%。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hubal Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Anunnaki[COLOR_REVERT] and originate in the Arabian peninsula.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]胡巴尔神庙[COLOR_REVERT]是继[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]阿努纳基[COLOR_REVERT]之后起源于阿拉伯半岛的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Distillery
TEXT.Chinese: 酿酒厂

TEXT.English: Security Bureau
TEXT.Chinese: 安全局

TEXT.English: Railway Station
TEXT.Chinese: 火车站

TEXT.English: Catholic Church
TEXT.Chinese: 天主教会

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dike[COLOR_REVERT], the Dutch replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT], provides a production bonus from all water tiles worked by a city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]堤坝[COLOR_REVERT]，荷兰人取代了[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]堤坝[COLOR_REVERT]，从一个城市生产的所有水砖中获得生产奖金。

TEXT.English: Sejmik
TEXT.Chinese: 贵族议会

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]熏房[COLOR_REVERT]通过访问[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]奶牛[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鹿[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]猪[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]羊[COLOR_REVERT]来增加城市的健康。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Art Studio[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a big culture boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]艺术工作室[COLOR_REVERT]，意大利替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]锻造[COLOR_REVERT]，提供了一个大的文化促进，并允许你雇用一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Mounted Police[COLOR_REVERT], the Canadian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabulary[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]皇家骑警署[COLOR_REVERT]是加拿大的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]警察局[COLOR_REVERT]，能增加[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马[COLOR_REVERT]资源带来的快乐。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Electrical Grids[COLOR_REVERT] increase commerce output in cities with access to power. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Electrical Grids [COLOR_REVERT] are required to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fiber Network[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]电网[COLOR_REVERT]增加有电力供应的城市的商业产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]构建[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]光纤网络[COLOR_REVERT]需要电网[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Islamic Mosque
TEXT.Chinese: 伊斯兰礼拜堂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Security Bureaus[COLOR_REVERT] increase the cost of enemy espionage missions in their city and grant [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Informant I[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]安全局[COLOR_REVERT]增加敌方在其城市的间谍任务成本，并将[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]线人I[COLOR_REVERT]授予在其城市建造的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍单元[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Souq
TEXT.Chinese: 露天市场

TEXT.English: Star Fort
TEXT.Chinese: 星堡

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]所有圣徒教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新教神殿[COLOR_REVERT]）为世界上每一个实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]新教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每转产生一枚金币，上限为20枚。它还传播了新教的思想，增加了城市产生伟大先知的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output with access to power. They also increase the happiness output from using the culture slider, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CN Tower[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市文化产出。并可提升通过文化滑杆调整快乐度的能力。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estates[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the happiness output from using the culture slider and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]庄园[COLOR_REVERT]大幅增加了一个城市的文化产出。它们还可以通过使用文化滑块增加幸福感输出，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]专家。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ger[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongol replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stable[COLOR_REVERT], grant even more experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city. It also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]毡帐[COLOR_REVERT]是蒙古的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马厩[COLOR_REVERT]，为所在城市组建的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑座单位[COLOR_REVERT]提供更多的经验。同时增加已开发的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牛[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]羊[COLOR_REVERT]资源地块产出。

TEXT.English: Catholic Monastery
TEXT.Chinese: 天主教修道院

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大菩提寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Taoist Guan
TEXT.Chinese: 道观

TEXT.English: Post Office
TEXT.Chinese: 邮局

TEXT.English: Atua Shrine
TEXT.Chinese: 阿图亚神社

TEXT.English: Protestant Seminary
TEXT.Chinese: 新教神学院

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chaitya[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: Park
TEXT.Chinese: 公园

TEXT.English: Taixue
TEXT.Chinese: 太学

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Exchange[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's wealth more.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]皇家交易所[COLOR_REVERT]是英格兰的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]，更大幅增加所在城市的金币产出。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Centres[COLOR_REVERT] reduce unhealthiness from corporations.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]回收中心[COLOR_REVERT]可消除城市设施带来的污染，例如[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工场[COLOR_REVERT]，污染问题在大城市中相当严重。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT], the Viking replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT], gives all ships built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Navigation I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贸易据点[COLOR_REVERT]是维京的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市水域的食物产出，并使城市组建的船只自动获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]导航一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Container Terminals[COLOR_REVERT] increase the commerce generated by a city's foreign trade routes.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]集装箱码头[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市外贸路线产生的商业。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vedic Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vedism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吠陀神庙[COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]吠陀[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Confucian Miao
TEXT.Chinese: 学馆

TEXT.English: Logistics Center
TEXT.Chinese: 物流中心

TEXT.English: Orthodox Cathedral
TEXT.Chinese: 东正教大教堂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天文台[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市科研能力。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。

TEXT.English: Taoist Dongtian
TEXT.Chinese: 道院

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fire Temples[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fire Temples[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火神庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德教神庙[COLOR_REVERT]）增加城市的幸福感和文化。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德王朝皇家火灾[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]建筑需要火神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马厩[COLOR_REVERT]为骑乘单位提供额外经验值。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catholic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天主教修道院[COLOR_REVERT]）允许您创建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]天主教传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，他们可以在其他城市传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]天主教[COLOR_REVERT]。它们也为研究提供了文化和些许推动。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saint Peter's Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣彼得大教堂[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天主教神殿[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]）为世界上每一个信奉[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天主教[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]的城市每转一圈生产一枚黄金。它还传播了天主教（COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT）的思想，并增加了它的城市产生一个（COLOR_UNIT_TEXT）伟大先知（COLOR_REVERT）的机会。

TEXT.English: Tambo
TEXT.Chinese: 土堡驿站

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Stations[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's unhealthiness, provide an extra trade route and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Stations[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chateau Frontenac[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火车站[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的不健康，提供额外的贸易路线，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]专家。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火车站[COLOR_REVERT]需要建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡Frontenac[COLOR_REVERT]world wonder

TEXT.English: Royal Exchange
TEXT.Chinese: 皇家交易所

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueducts[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueducts[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。如希望城市进一步发展可建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，或在居民提出要求时再建造。

TEXT.English: Hindu Mandir
TEXT.Chinese: 印度教神庙

TEXT.English: Hindu Ashram
TEXT.Chinese: 印度教静修院

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Plaas[COLOR_REVERT], the Boer replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Star Fort[COLOR_REVERT], provides two extra food.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Plaas[COLOR_REVERT]是波尔人对[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]星堡[COLOR_REVERT]的替代品，提供两种额外的食物。

TEXT.English: Supercomputer
TEXT.Chinese: 超级计算机

TEXT.English: Ziggurat
TEXT.Chinese: 巴比伦塔庙

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Atua Shrine[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Atua[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿图亚神殿[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿图亚[COLOR_REVERT]之后的文明的异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Inti Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Inti[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Inti Temple[COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Inti[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arenas[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and its happiness output from using the culture slider. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arenas[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stadium[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的快乐值，并可通过调整文化杠杆增加快乐值。所在城市拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]体育场[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。

TEXT.English: Mina'
TEXT.Chinese: 阿曼灯塔

TEXT.English: Sheep and Cows attract the Silk Route
TEXT.Chinese: 羊和牛吸引了丝绸之路

TEXT.English: Church of the Anastasis
TEXT.Chinese: 阿纳斯塔西斯教堂

TEXT.English: Constabulary
TEXT.Chinese: 警察局

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Automated Factories[COLOR_REVERT] increase production output in cities with access to power and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自动化工厂[COLOR_REVERT]在有电力供应的城市增加产量，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs, provide you with a bonus to espionage and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]降低城市维护费，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助维持广阔的帝国。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coffee Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tabacco[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]咖啡馆[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的文化产出。他们还可以使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]咖啡[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]糖[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]茶[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]烟草[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，增加城市的幸福感。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sangam[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra cultural boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sangam[COLOR_REVERT]，泰米尔替代品[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]库[COLOR_REVERT]，提供额外的文化提升，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dongtianas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taoist Daoshis[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Logistics Centers[COLOR_REVERT] increase wealth in cities with access to power and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]物流中心[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的财富，获得电力，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商人[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]News Presses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新闻媒体[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的文化产出。他们还提高了一个城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟人[COLOR_REVERT]出生率，并允许你雇用一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: Coffee House
TEXT.Chinese: 咖啡馆

TEXT.English: Garden
TEXT.Chinese: 花园

TEXT.English: Vedic Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 吠陀神庙

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glassmaker[COLOR_REVERT], the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's trade route yield.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]玻璃制造厂[COLOR_REVERT]，腓尼基人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场[COLOR_REVERT]，增加城市的贸易路线产量。

TEXT.English: Customs House
TEXT.Chinese: 海关

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] help units heal damage more quickly and add health to a city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross Society[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助单位恢复战斗力，并提升城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: Dinh
TEXT.Chinese: 越南市民广场

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sanghas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Buddhist Bhikkus[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iya[COLOR_REVERT], the Nigerian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iya[COLOR_REVERT]是尼日利亚对[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]墙的替代品，降低了城市维护成本。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They are also required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Squares[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Monument[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]可提供少量文化点数，适宜在早期扩展城市的文化边界。

TEXT.English: Estate
TEXT.Chinese: 庄园

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sanhedrin[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教会堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]为官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levees[COLOR_REVERT] provide a production bonus from all river tiles worked by the city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levees[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brooklyn Bridge[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防洪堤[COLOR_REVERT]可使沿河地块额外增加1单位产能。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupas[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Chaitya[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: Baalist Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 巴利斯特神庙

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pharmacies[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's healthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Banana[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]药房[COLOR_REVERT]通过访问[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香蕉[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]葡萄酒[COLOR_REVERT]，增加城市的健康，并允许您雇用一名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: Dike
TEXT.Chinese: 堤防

TEXT.English: Protestant Church
TEXT.Chinese: 新教教堂

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baray[COLOR_REVERT], the Khmer replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides two extra food.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人工湖[COLOR_REVERT]为高棉特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，除提供健康加成外还额外提供食物奖励。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人工湖[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天主教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）极大地增加了城市的文化输出。如果天主教是你的国教，或者你有权使用香薰，这会增加城市的幸福感。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's culture. They also allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cinemas[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市文化值，并可通过文化滑杆调整快乐度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]也是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT] increase food output in cities with access to power.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]超级市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]野鹿[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牛群[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]家猪[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绵羊[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升其效果。

TEXT.English: Astar Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 阿斯塔神庙

TEXT.English: Ger
TEXT.Chinese: 毡帐

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sejmik[COLOR_REVERT], the Polish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small cash and happiness bonus.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]波兰地区议会[COLOR_REVERT]，波兰替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法院[COLOR_REVERT]，提供少量现金和幸福奖金。

TEXT.English: News Press
TEXT.Chinese: 新闻出版社

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kraal[COLOR_REVERT], the Zimbabwean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouse[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]津巴布韦牧场[COLOR_REVERT]是津巴布韦替代[COLOR\u BUILDING_TEXT]烟熏房[COLOR_REVERT]的产品，提高了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]奶牛[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鹿[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]猪[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马[COLOR\u REVERT]的地块产量。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Edict[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance costs.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法令[COLOR_REVERT]，印度取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，降低了城市维护成本。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide dirty power with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]为工厂提供电力，但其造成的污染会影响城市健康度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Piaohao[COLOR_REVERT], the Manchurian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], stores food.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]票号[COLOR_REVERT]是满洲人对[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行的替代品，储存食物。

TEXT.English: Shinto Shrine
TEXT.Chinese: 神社

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's scientific research as well as providing a small amount of culture.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科学院[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力以及文化产出。

TEXT.English: Smokehouse
TEXT.Chinese: 熏肉坊

TEXT.English: Noria
TEXT.Chinese: 戽水车

TEXT.English: Ancestor Shrine
TEXT.Chinese: 祖祠

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] add an additional trade route, provide an experience bonus to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Air Units[COLOR_REVERT], house four extra Air Units for a total of eight and can airlift one unit per turn to any of your other cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市商路增加，拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]的城市可空运单位。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Warehouses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth and allow you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Warehouses[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Logistics Centers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]仓库[COLOR_REVERT]增加一个城市的财富，允许你雇佣两个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商人[COLOR_REVERT]专家。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]仓库[COLOR_REVERT]需要建立[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]物流中心[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Wharf
TEXT.Chinese: 码头

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production output and unhealthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminium[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT]. They also allow you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工业园区[COLOR_REVERT]允许增加两位工程师，再免费供养一位工程师。其代价是增加城市的疾病值。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pesedjet Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pesedjet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佩塞德杰神庙[COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佩塞德杰[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Orthodox Church
TEXT.Chinese: 东正教礼拜堂

TEXT.English: The Temple of Heaven
TEXT.Chinese: 岱庙

TEXT.English: Kraal
TEXT.Chinese: 津巴布韦牧场

TEXT.English: Confucian Guozijian
TEXT.Chinese: 学宫

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mazdaist Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mazdaism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]玛兹达神庙COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]妈祖庙[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The Swedish [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Riksbank[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's production of wealth and increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.
TEXT.Chinese: 瑞典的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瑞典皇家银行[COLOR_REVERT]极大地增加了一个城市的财富生产，并提高了一个城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的出生率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cold Storage Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the Argentine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]冷藏库[COLOR_REVERT]是阿根廷的特色建筑，替代COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]超级市场[COLOR_REVERT]，增加已开发的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牛[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鹿[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]猪[COLOR_REVERT]资源地块产出。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Noria[COLOR_REVERT], the Moorish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and provides a production bonus.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]诺里亚[COLOR_REVERT]，摩尔人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]渡槽[COLOR_REVERT]，更便宜，并提供生产奖金。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Intelligence Agencies[COLOR_REVERT] increase the espionage points created by the city and grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Intelligence Agencies[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]情报局[COLOR_REVERT]可增加城市谍报点数。并允许增加两位间谍类专业人员。

TEXT.English: Orthodox Monastery
TEXT.Chinese: 东正教修道院

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿德尔・法恩巴格[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德教圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]）为世界上每一个实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每转产生一枚金币，上限为20枚金币。它也在全世界传播了琐罗亚斯德教[COLOR_REVERT]，并增加了这个城市产生[COLOR_REVERT]伟大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Squares[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市民广场[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的文化输出。他们还提高了一个城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟人[COLOR_REVERT]出生率，并允许你雇用一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: Pharmacy
TEXT.Chinese: 药店

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rathaus[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Square[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]议会厅[COLOR_REVERT]为神圣罗马的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]，可使城市维护费大幅减少。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Reservoir[COLOR_REVERT], the Harappan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Masonry[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Medicine[COLOR_REVERT] technology and doesn't require an [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]蓄水池[COLOR_REVERT]是哈拉帕的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]浴场[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]石工术[COLOR_REVERT]科技而不是[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]传统医学[COLOR_REVERT]科技即可建造，并且建造时无需[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Civic Square
TEXT.Chinese: 市民广场

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shrine of Perun[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rodnovery[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 佩伦的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神龛[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]的文明遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]罗德诺弗瑞[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念石柱[COLOR_REVERT]为埃塞俄比亚的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，可使所在城市文化产出大幅增加。

TEXT.English: Administrative Center
TEXT.Chinese: 行政中心

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandirs[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. The first player to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandir[COLOR_REVERT] founds Buddhism. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandirs[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Kshetra[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sewers[COLOR_REVERT] improve a city's health. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sewers[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abbey Mills[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]下水道[COLOR_REVERT]改善城市健康。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院米尔斯[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观需要下水道[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Vegvar
TEXT.Chinese: 匈牙利城堡

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zaibatsu[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and improves the commerce output of water plots.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]财阀[COLOR_REVERT]，日本取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]，更便宜，给一个免费的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]专家和提高商业产出的水田。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ball Court[COLOR_REVERT], the Mayan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arena[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, increases happiness from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Event[COLOR_REVERT] and grants experience points to melee and archery units built in its city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]足球场[COLOR_REVERT]，玛雅人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，更便宜，增加了进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]击中足球事件[COLOR_REVERT]的快乐，并授予在其城市中建造的近战和射箭单位经验点。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ashrams[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hindu Gurus[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克尔白天房[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊斯兰教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Tengri Obo
TEXT.Chinese: 天顶欧博

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seminaries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Protestant Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神学院[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]新教修道院[COLOR_REVERT]）允许您创建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]新教传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，他们可以在其他城市传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]新教[COLOR_REVERT]。它们也为研究提供了文化和些许推动。

TEXT.English: Jewish Synagogue
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太礼拜堂

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs and increase espionage. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabularies[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]减少城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]厌战情绪[COLOR_REVERT]。可在要卷入长期战争时，或在市民提出要求时建造。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dun[COLOR_REVERT], the Celtic replacement for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerrilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]丘堡[COLOR_REVERT]是凯尔特的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市防御冷兵器时代单位的能力，并使所在城市新组建的单位自动获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]游击一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升。

TEXT.English: Plague
TEXT.Chinese: 瘟疫

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] increase production, increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gems[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silver[COLOR_REVERT], but also add unhealthiness. They also allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iron Pillar[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的生产能力，但也会影响城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], the Indonesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides one production.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]浮屠[COLOR_REVERT]代替[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧院[COLOR_REVERT]为印尼提供+1快乐和额外的文化。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vertical Farms[COLOR_REVERT] increase food output in cities with access to power.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]垂直农场[COLOR_REVERT]在有电力供应的城市增加粮食产量。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] boost your city's research and provide culture. They also allow you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]促进城市的科研并提供文化产出。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance of attracting immigrants
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]增加了吸引移民的机会

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Heaven[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]岱庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Synagogues[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Synagogues[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Sanhedrin[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Caravanserai[COLOR_REVERT], the Iranian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Office[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra trade route, increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊朗商站[COLOR_REVERT]是伊朗的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]邮局[COLOR_REVERT]，额外增加一条商路，增加已开发的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]熏香[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丝绸[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]资源地块产出。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Yoruba Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Yoruba[COLOR_REVERT].
