TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]约鲁巴神庙[COLOR_REVERT]是遵循[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]约鲁巴[COLOR_REVERT]的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Public Transportation[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's health and even more increase the city's healthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]公交系统[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，如有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]再额外增加健康，如实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绿色经济[COLOR_REVERT]再额外增加健康度。

TEXT.English: Mint
TEXT.Chinese: 铸币厂

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seowon[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology and instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Academia[COLOR_REVERT] technology.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]私塾[COLOR_REVERT]是高丽的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]，提升城市科研能力的作用比[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]更强，并能提供文化点数。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stadiums[COLOR_REVERT] provide happiness and increase a city's cultural output with access to power. They also increase the happiness if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Event[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]体育场[COLOR_REVERT]提供快乐，增加城市的文化产出，获得权力。如果你能进入 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]足球比赛[COLOR_REVERT]，他们也会增加你的快乐。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Immigration Office[COLOR_REVERT], the Australian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT], can be build in every city and provides an extra trade route.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]移民局[COLOR_REVERT]是澳大利亚替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关大楼[COLOR_REVERT]的地方，可在每个城市修建，并提供额外的贸易路线。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kshetra[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教神殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT], the Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巴西农场[COLOR_REVERT]是巴西的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]庄园[COLOR_REVERT]，增加已开发的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香蕉[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]糖[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]咖啡[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]烟草[COLOR_REVERT]资源地块产出。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kibbutz[COLOR_REVERT], the Israeli replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Park[COLOR_REVERT], grants additional food and increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]基布兹[COLOR_REVERT]是以色列取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]公园[COLOR_REVERT]的地方，它提供额外的食物，并提高一个城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的出生率。

TEXT.English: Divan
TEXT.Chinese: 迪凡

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temples[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提供少量文化。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggurat[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Anunnaki[COLOR_REVERT] and originate in Mesopotamia.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巴比伦塔庙[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]是继[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]阿努纳基[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]之后起源于美索不达米亚的文明的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]异教徒神庙[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guans[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guans[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Gong[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: Feitoria
TEXT.Chinese: 费里亚托

TEXT.English: All Saints' Church
TEXT.Chinese: 新教圣坛

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziara[COLOR_REVERT], the Swahili replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], grants one free trade route.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziara[COLOR_REVERT]是斯瓦希里人[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]的替代品，提供了一条自由贸易路线。

TEXT.English: Plaas
TEXT.Chinese: 波尔星堡

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Land Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市组建的单位提供经验值。可在所有需要组建军事单位的城市建造。

TEXT.English: Zango
TEXT.Chinese: 乍得灯塔

TEXT.English: Electrical Grid
TEXT.Chinese: 电网

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academies[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Confucian Scholars[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: Mala'e
TEXT.Chinese: 玛拉

TEXT.English: Zaibatsu
TEXT.Chinese: 日本财阀

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hacienda[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]哥伦比亚庄园[COLOR_REVERT]是哥伦比亚的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]庄园[COLOR_REVERT]，增加已开发的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香蕉[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]咖啡[COLOR_REVERT]资源地块产出。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Madrasahs[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Islamic Imams[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: Pagan Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 原始神庙

TEXT.English: Iya
TEXT.Chinese: 尼日利亚城墙

TEXT.English: Vertical Farm
TEXT.Chinese: 垂直农场

TEXT.English: Asatru Hof
TEXT.Chinese: 阿萨特鲁霍夫

TEXT.English: Candi
TEXT.Chinese: 浮屠

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cinemas[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the happiness output and even more if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] and allow you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]电影院[COLOR_REVERT]增加城市的文化产出。它们还可以增加幸福感的输出，如果你可以访问[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]，并允许你雇佣一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家，则会增加幸福感的输出。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Alchemist[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pharmacy[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's science output.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]炼金作坊[COLOR_REVERT]是阿拉伯的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]药房[COLOR_REVERT]，增加城市的科研产出。

TEXT.English: Inti Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 印地安寺

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Solar Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]太阳能发电厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供无污染电力。

TEXT.English: Temazcal
TEXT.Chinese: 特马兹卡尔

TEXT.English: Sangam
TEXT.Chinese: 桑迦姆

TEXT.English: Kibbutz
TEXT.Chinese: 以色列基布兹

TEXT.English: Pesedjet Temple
TEXT.Chinese: 佩塞德杰神庙

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mbwadi[COLOR_REVERT], the Congolese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Weaver[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's wealth output and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]姆瓦迪[COLOR_REVERT]，刚果人取代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]编织者[COLOR_REVERT]，增加了城市的财富产出，并允许你雇用一个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商人[COLOR_REVERT]专家。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]所罗门圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ancestor Shrine[COLOR_REVERT] is the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] of civilizations that follow [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shendao[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]祖先神龛[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神道[COLOR_REVERT]之后的文明异教徒神殿[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Port
TEXT.Chinese: 菲律宾港口
